quoteText: Music is like magic, there's a certain feelin' you get.
author: Eminem, the greatest rapper of all time

quoteText: Writing about music is like dancing about architecture.
author: Martin Mull, a comedian
Hans Christian Andersen, a Danish author

quoteText: Music is the strongest form of magic.
author: Marilyn Manson, an American musician

quoteText: Every song is like a painting.
author: Dick Dale

quoteText: Next to the word of God, the noble art of music is the greatest treasure in the world.
author: Martin Luther
